CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Verdant Hall relative to Aethelgard Historical Archive?
SRP.A: The Verdant Hall is {below} Aethelgard Historical Archive in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Historical Archive relative to Gallery of Whispers?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Historical Archive is {below} Gallery of Whispers in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Chronos Museum relative to The Verdant Hall?
SRP.A: The Chronos Museum is {above} The Verdant Hall in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total museum visitors?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aethelgard Historical Archive}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total museum visitors?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Chronos Museum}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Historical Archive's minimum Museum Visitors in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Historical Archive's minimum Museum Visitors is in {1970}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Historical Archive's maximum Museum Visitors in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Historical Archive's maximum Museum Visitors is in {1994}.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1991, did the total Museum Visitors experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1987?
NC.A: The change in total museum visitors between 1970 and 1991 was {larger} than between 1983 and 1987.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1979, did the total Museum Visitors experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1992?
NC.A: The change in total museum visitors between 1970 and 1979 was {smaller} than between 1980 and 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1994, was the average total Museum Visitors higher or lower than between 1989 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total museum visitors between 1987 and 1994 was {higher} than between 1989 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1987, was the average total Museum Visitors higher or lower than between 1975 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total museum visitors between 1981 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1978.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aethelgard Historical Archive} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard Historical Archive and Museum of Stellar Artifice first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard Historical Archive and Museum of Stellar Artifice first exchanged leading positions in {1971}.
